about_the_game:
The official soundtrack of Snufkin: Melody of Moominvalley is an atmospheric and relaxing 25-track album composed by Oda Tilset and contains tracks in collaboration with the renowned Icelandic band Sigur Rós.

Inspired by the Nordic landscape - from harsh weather to unique stunning views of nature and wilderness - the melodies born in the hands and hearts of Oda Tilset and Sigur Rós contribute to Snufkin: Melody of Moominvalley’s enchanting appeal and atmosphere, touching the soul and wraping it up in a warm blanket full of love and tenderness.

This is a digital soundtrack. Upon purchase, it will be downloaded to the Steam folder on your computer. Enjoy!
